snippet.title: Lost Artifacts: Golden Island Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Free: https://www.gamefools.com/pc-games/lost-artifacts-golden-island.html

Claire and her team are in trouble again. Their airplane flew into a terrible storm and crashed on an uninhabited island in the middle of the ocean. When they woke up, our heroes went out in search of help. After wandering a while, Claire found a village of Atlanteans and offered to help them get their homeland back, and to teach the wicked ruler of the underwater world a lesson. Go on an unforgettable adventure to restore Atlantis and defeat the villain in Lost Artifacts: Golden Island.
